name: Air Fryer Pakoras
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: All the things you love about pakoras but without the guilt by air frying instead of deep frying. Don't forget the yogurt dipping sauce!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Combine cauliflower, potatoes, chickpea flour, water, red onion, salt, garlic, curry powder, coriander, cayenne, and cumin in a large bowl
Set aside to rest for 10 minutes
Preheat air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray the basket of the air fryer with cooking spray
Spoon 2 tablespoons of cauliflower mixture into the basket and flatten
Repeat this as many times as your basket space allows without the pakoras touching
Mist the top of each pakora with non-stick spray
Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate
